pages.text: Some plants in the $(thing)Misty World$() bloom only in specific $(thing)Seasons$(). The current date can be seen on the tooltip of a $(item)Clock$() while in the $(thing)Misty World$().$(br2)Each $(thing)Month$() lasts for 4 days. The main things this affects are $(item)Desert Cotton$(), and $(item)Tree Seeds$().

pages.title: Clock
pages.text: Check the tooltip of a $(item)Clock$() to see the current date while in the $(thing)Misty World$().
